## Checklist

- [ ] PR title follows convention (`feat:`, `bug:`, `doc:`, `chore:`)

- [ ] New/changed behavior covered by tests
- [ ] Coverage thresholds met (parser 100%, ordered_map 100%, kubernetes 95%)
